name: .DTSX File Extension
summary: Learn about .DTSX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data Transformation Services (DTS) file used by SQL Server, an RDBMS (relational database management system) application; specifies settings for migrating data between databases; allows the integration of external data sources.

content: DTSX files are used by SSIS (SQL Server Integration Services), a component of SQL Server.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
